title: BussDee
description: Are you interested in  music, cartoons, videos, politics and other cool content created by my family?

post.title: My Zite is online !
post.body:
My Zite is online. Still in beta and under construction, but you can visit it now. Please "download & share" if you like it, we need more peers. Just visit the Zite and DRAG the "0" in the upper right corner to the left. A sidebar will appear. Search for the activation to share this content to show some support. With growing peers we will add more content every day/week/...

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/

post.title: "The BussToons"
post.body: Welcome ZeroNet users. I am very proud to welcome you at my new uncensored blog. I will do my best to release everything in english. Please dont be too harsh with me if my english sucks, i will do my best. ;) I am creating some cool characters right now. I will try to release some animated short movies in future with those characters. I will try to learn now, how to add images to my posts in this ZeroBlog. "Stay tooned" for some really cool character image releases.

post.title: HELLO WORLD
post.body:
**_"Your zeronet blog has been successfully created!"_**

_... and i will start adding more links, features and content. Follow me, if you like to support this project. With raising followers this project will grow._
